Name: ClipDrawArea
Notes: An area that creates and enables Matter Splatter effects for compatible objects (SimpleClipPartsObj, etc.) when entered by the player. This also creates an instance of FallOutFieldDraw, which is needed to render the clipped objects. The effect will not work if the player is outside a ClipDrawArea. Furthermore, if StarLightReceiver objects, such as PunchingKinoko or BloomFlower, are placed inside this area, special behavior will be enabled for them. See the respective objects for more information.

Obj_arg0.Name: Display Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies how the compatible objects are clipped.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
